  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1197</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Journey of the Holy Ark1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Reise des heiligen Ark1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le voyage de l'Ark1 saint</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A viagem do Ark1 holy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il viaggio del Ark1 santo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ταξίδι ιερό Ark1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El viaje del Ark1 santo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this multiple intelligences unit, learners review Samuel I, 4-7:2 by building a three-dimensional display of the ancient Israel and the Ark. learners then read through the text and selected commentaries and ‘act out’ the storyline, using the display.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Samuel I</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ark</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish studies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser mehrfachen Intelligenzmaßeinheit 
wiederholen Anfänger Samuel I, 4-7:2, indem sie eine dreidimensionale
Bildschirmanzeige des alten Israels und der Arche Anfänger dann durch
den Text und ausgewählten die Kommentare und das?act ausgelesen 
aufbauen? das storyline mit der Bildschirmanzeige.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette unité d'intelligences multiple, les 
étudiants passent en revue Samuel I, 4-7:2 en établissant un 
affichage tridimensionnel de l'Israel antique et les étudiants 
d'arche puis donné lecture par le texte et les commentaires et le 
?act choisis  ? le storyline, en utilisant l'affichage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta unidade de inteligências múltipla, os 
learners revêem Samuel I, 4-7:2 construindo um indicador 
tridimensional da Israel antiga e os learners da arca a seguir lido 
através do texto e os commentaries e o?act selecionados para fora? 
o storyline, usando o indicador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa unità di intelligenza multipla, i 
principianti rivedono Samuel I, 4-7:2 sviluppando una visualizzazione 
tridimensionale dell'Israele antico ed i principianti dell'arca quindi
colta attraverso il testo ed i commenti ed il?act selezionati fuori? 
lo storyline, usando la visualizzazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την πολλαπλάσια μονάδα intelligences, οι 
αρχάριοι αναθεωρούν το Samuel I, 47:2 με την οικοδόμηση 
μιας τρισδιάστατης παρουσίασης του αρχαίου Ισραήλ και των 
αρχαρίων κιβωτών που διαβάζονται έπειτα μέσω του κειμένου και 
επέλεξαν τα σχόλια και ?act έξω; το storyline, που 
χρησιμοποιεί την παρουσίαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿En esta unidad de inteligencias múltiple, los 
principiantes repasan Samuel I, 4-7:2 construyendo una visualización 
tridimensional del Israel antiguo y los principiantes de la arca 
después leída a través del texto y los comentarios y el?act 
seleccionados hacia fuera? el storyline, usando la 
visualización.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Samuel I</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
